name: Tonya Rebhahn
what_you_do: Tonya Rebhahn is a life coach certified in NLP, Hypnotherapy, and Holistic Nutrition who helps clients with mindset, trauma recovery, and confidence building.
who_you_serve: Primarily women who have experienced abusive relationships and are seeking to regain confidence.
social_proof: 19K Instagram followers; certified in NLP, Hypnotherapy, Holistic Nutrition, Trauma Care, and Nervous System Regulation; author of 'The Real Pandemic: Mentally Thrive Through Psychological Warfare'
signature_programs: Book: 'The Real Pandemic: Mentally Thrive Through Psychological Warfare'; Talk: 'Unleashing Your Inner Power: What Does Low Confidence Really Cost You?'
business_focus: Helping women recover from trauma and abusive relationships through mindset coaching and certified therapeutic techniques.
service_provided: life coaching, NLP, hypnotherapy, holistic nutrition coaching, speaking, trauma care
